name: Moving On (pmedroa)
description:
CONTROLS

movement - arrow keys / WASD

start - enter

interact - Z ( and you should touch the objects with the characters face )

note: check if caps lock is on, if it is, turn it off

____________________________________

Your name is Alex. Your family is moving out of the house, since it's too big for just the 3 family members. Your mom asks you to pack up the things you deem important to you, but they all bring some memories from the past. Would you rather forget them or keep them close to you?

____________________________________

CREDITS

Leonardo Carolo

Margarida Dias

Pedro Medroa
